mapper.insert: insert into my_user (user_id, user_zh, user_pass, user_xm, user_phone, user_addr, user_choose) values (#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userZh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userPass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userXm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userChoose,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update my_user set user_zh = #{userZh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_pass = #{userPass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_xm = #{userXm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_phone = #{userPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_addr = #{userAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_choose = #{userChoose,jdbcType=INTEGER} where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select user_id, user_zh, user_pass, user_xm, user_phone, user_addr, user_choose from my_user
